description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红的出生地，位于山东省。
description.en: Birthplace of Lü Weihong, located in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国海关总署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署
en: General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的主管海关事务的正部级直属机构。
description.en: A ministry-level agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for customs affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署设在太原的直属海关机构。
description.en: A customs agency directly under the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China, located in Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署设在海口的直属海关机构。
description.en: A customs agency directly under the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China, located in Haikou.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国海关总署副署长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署副署长
en: Vice Minister of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署的副职领导职务。
description.en: Deputy leadership position of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的前任海关总署人事教育司司长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Lü Weihong as Director of the Personnel and Education Department of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的后任海关总署人事教育司司长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Lü Weihong as Director of the Personnel and Education Department of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的前任海口海关关长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Lü Weihong as Head of Haikou Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的后任海口海关关长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Lü Weihong as Head of Haikou Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的前任太原海关关长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, predecessor of Lü Weihong as Head of Taiyuan Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吕伟红的后任太原海关关长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, successor of Lü Weihong as Head of Taiyuan Customs.

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红曾任海关总署政治部副主任。
description.en: Lü Weihong previously served as the Deputy Director of the Political Department of the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署

position.en: Director of the Political Department, Member of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红现任中华人民共和国海关总署政治部主任、党委委员。
description.en: Lü Weihong currently serves as the Director of the Political Department and a member of the Party Committee of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署副署长

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红曾任中华人民共和国海关总署副署长。
description.en: Lü Weihong previously served as the Vice Minister of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红接替李国担任海关总署人事教育司司长。
description.en: Lü Weihong succeeded Li Guo as Director of the Personnel and Education Department of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 冉辉接替吕伟红担任海关总署人事教育司司长。
description.en: Ran Hui succeeded Lü Weihong as Director of the Personnel and Education Department of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红接替李蓝雪担任海口海关关长。
description.en: Lü Weihong succeeded Li Lanxue as Head of Haikou Customs.

description.zh-cn: 陈振冲接替吕伟红担任海口海关关长。
description.en: Chen Zhenchong succeeded Lü Weihong as Head of Haikou Customs.

description.zh-cn: 吕伟红接替周斌担任太原海关关长。
description.en: Lü Weihong succeeded Zhou Bin as Head of Taiyuan Customs.

description.zh-cn: 吴海平接替吕伟红担任太原海关关长。
description.en: Wu Haiping succeeded Lü Weihong as Head of Taiyuan Customs.
